parameters.name: enumClass
parameters.doc: The class of the enum that is used.

parameters.name: factory
parameters.doc: A factory function that creates the objects to be registered.

doc.summary: Creates a new instance of EnumObjects.
doc.text: Creates a new instance of EnumObjects.

doc.summary: Gets a random object from the objects in this EnumObjects.
doc.text: Gets a random object from the objects in this EnumObjects.

doc.summary: A <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/mod/registration/Registerable">Registerable</ref> that registers multiple objects, one for each value of an enum.
doc.text: A <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/mod/registration/Registerable">Registerable</ref> that registers multiple objects, one for each value of an enum. This is  done via <ref cls="io/github/noeppi_noeppi/libx/mod/registration/Registerable" method="getNamedAdditionalRegisters" type="(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation)java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>">Registerable#getNamedAdditionalRegisters(ResourceLocation)</ref> so the enum names will be  applied automatically.
